MyTestCase with 5 testXXX() methods runs as expected. When I added a
sixth testXXX() method, I get the following error message:
    [java] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
sun/reflect/ConstructorAccessorImpl

When I comment out one of the original testXXX() methods, everything
runs as expected, so the 6th testXXX() method I added is fine.

I checked the FAQ but couldn't find this issue discussed.

Thanks for any information.
